name: Shovel Space
description:
Work together as a shaft and a tip, to defend against your mortal enemies, the rock(s). Use your versatile (shovel)tips, protect your shaft and survive seemingly endless waves of enemies.

This local multiplayer game merges the themes of "Together" and "Shovel" from Mini Game Jam #15. Players control a single shovel, divided into two parts, to fend off waves of enemies. Each player takes control of one part of the shovel, working in tandem to succeed.

Controls:

PLayer1: w, a,d to move, Space to launch shovel-tip

Player2: Left-, Right-Arrow to move, enter for the ability
